solution_line_template: Rory has {rory_more_than_gigi} more jellybeans than Gigi who has {gigi_jellybeans} so Rory has {rory_more_than_gigi}+{gigi_jellybeans} = <<{rory_more_than_gigi}+{gigi_jellybeans}={rory_jellybeans}>>{rory_jellybeans} jellybeans

Rory has {rory_jellybeans} jellybeans and Gigi has {gigi_jellybeans} so that's {rory_jellybeans}+{gigi_jellybeans} = <<{rory_jellybeans}+{gigi_jellybeans}={total_girls_jellybeans}>>{total_girls_jellybeans} jellybeans total

Lorelai has eaten three times the amount of jellybeans that both girls have so she has eaten {lorelai_multiplier}*{total_girls_jellybeans} = <<{lorelai_multiplier}*{total_girls_jellybeans}={lorelai_eaten}>>{lorelai_eaten} jellybeans
